name: Psychological Warfare Tactics
description: Strategic methods for dismantling the psychological influence of PSNs.

cards.title: Undermining the PSN’s Psychological Grip
cards.description: Disrupting their influence over individuals and groups.
bulletpoints: Using contradictory information to weaken their credibility among followers.
Encouraging independent critical thinking in their social circles to dissolve blind obedience.
Subtly reinforcing alternative viewpoints that destabilize their control.

cards.title: Weaponizing Truth Against PSNs
cards.description: Turning their own narratives against them using factual exposure.
bulletpoints: Identifying their core manipulative lies and methodically exposing them.
Using Socratic questioning to lead them into self-contradictions.
Ensuring public exposure of their behavior in a way that prevents them from regaining control.

cards.title: Destabilizing the PSN’s Psychological Operations
cards.description: Using tactical psychological counters to break their influence.
bulletpoints: Mirroring their manipulation back at them while remaining ethically sound.
Deploying social pressure reversal to shift their perceived power dynamic.
Encouraging cognitive dissonance among their followers to erode their authority.
